name: spm-project-g9t3
description: SMU IS212 Scrum Project - G9T3 - AY24-25 T1

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist &&  mkdir -p dist/Application && cp -r Application/* dist/Application && mkdir -p dist/ViewTeamSchedule && cp -r ViewTeamSchedule/* dist/ViewTeamSchedule && mkdir -p dist/ManageApplication && cp -r ManageApplication/* dist/ManageApplication && mkdir -p dist/Images && cp -r Images/* dist/Images && mkdir -p dist/ViewOwnSchedule && cp -r ViewOwnSchedule/* dist/ViewOwnSchedule && mkdir -p dist/Home && cp -r Home/* dist/Home && mkdir -p dist/HRRecords && cp -r HRRecords/* dist/HRRecords && cp login.css dist && cp login.html dist
